query:
SELECT 
                    ca.id,
                    ca.user_id,
                    ca.connector_type,
                    ca.account_name,
                    ca.account_identifier,
                    ca.status,
                    ca.last_sync_at,
                    ca.created_at,
                    ca.updated_at,
                    COALESCE(COUNT(sd.id), 0)::int as document_count
                FROM connected_accounts ca
                LEFT JOIN source_documents sd ON sd.source_id = ca.id
                WHERE ca.user_id = $1
                GROUP BY ca.id
                ORDER BY ca.created_at DESC
